txt.en:
'I have heard that you have some considerable skill in the craft of metalsmithing, [placeholder]. I would ask something of you, if you would aid the Council of the North in their battle against Angmar.

'There are certain intricate symbols that we use to identify our warriors in the field in order to reduce the risk of enemies infiltrating our ranks. Unfortunately, these Crests of Vigilance are in short supply, and we have little time for their crafting, given our pressing need to maintain weapons and armour.

'You can learn how they are made here in Gath Forthnír. If you can aid us in this simple task, the Council of the North will be indebted to you.'
'Ah, yes, these will do nicely! Thank you, [placeholder], for your assistance.'
'Have you no Crests of Vigilance for me?'
The Council of the North is in need of a means to identify their warriors in the field.
Present your Crests of Vigilance to Hróar at Gath Forthnír
Hróar is at Gath Forthnír in Angmar.\n\nHróar has asked you to craft some Crests of Vigilance and bring them to him.
